object.name: blackberry.utils
object.comment: The Utils object provides useful utility functions and properties.

func.name: generateUniqueId
func.comment: This method will generate a unique numbers.
func.details: Returns a unique number from JavaScript's Math.random() function.

func.name: parseURL
func.comment: Parses a URL string and returns an URL object.

param.name: url
param.comment: The URL string to be parsed.

func.details: A URL object is returned if the parsing is successful.

object.name: blackberry.utils.URL
object.comment: The URL object is dynamically generated and returned from the parseURL function.
object.details: The URL object is dynamically generated and returned from the parseURL function. It contains fields of interest from the URL.

property.name: host
property.comment: Host address in the URL string.

property.name: port
property.comment: Port number in the URL string.

func.name: getURLParameterByIndex
func.comment: Obtain the value of a parameter by index. The values are stored in the order they appear in the URL string.

param.name: index
param.comment: index of the parameter to be retrieved.

func.name: getURLParameter
func.comment: Obtain the value of a parameter by key.

param.name: key
param.comment: The key of the parameter to be retrieved.

func.details: An undefined object is returned if the key does not exist in the URL query.
